discussion.p: For bullet (3.2), no base classes are described as non-virtual. Rather, base classes are not specified as virtual, a subtly different negative.

blockquote.p: Every base class not specified as virtual shall not be virtual;

discussion.p: Accepted as Immediate to resolve NB comment.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4640.

blockquote.del: Every base class described as non-virtual shall not be virtual;
blockquote.ins: Every base class not specified as virtual shall not be virtual;
